title: Swarm Code Generation & Documentation Policy
description: Defines standard procedures for generating code, preserving metadata, and documenting learning from failures.

policies.metadata_preservation: Preserve descriptive comment blocks (MCP headers) during modification.

commenting.rule: Modules must have an outline at the start; explain complex logic inline.

failed_attempts.rule: Comment out failed code; add structured JSON learning summary at top.

policies.temporary_scripts: Permanentize and commit recurring automation scripts.
policies.html_headers: Maintain structural integrity when adding HTML headers.

mcp_headers.rule: Mandatory JSON MCP header for all Configuration and Script files.
